subject: Pedals, missing content from order
description_text:
Dear Simsonn staff

I received my pedals in perfect condition.
But, it seems the haptic motors and the upgrade kit are still missing.
Will this be delivered separately?

My order is #SSN4558

Kind regards

Steve

conversations.body_text: Hi NXGN Saxo,    I apologize for not getting back to you sooner. Here is your shipping tracking link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047152634679
